title: Laboratorio di Pasta
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Kosher
description: Changed to be a vegetarian restaurant in 2014. Has a separate vegan menu with several pastas - including wholewheat pasta and vegan gnocchi - and variety of toppings such as walnuts, olives, and mushroom. Informal fast-food atmosphere with food served in takeaway containers. Wheelchair accessible for outside seating.
